news.title: Search Feature Added
news.description: Lapix OS now supports search in the All Apps menu. You can quickly find and launch your tools.

news.title: API Tester Released
news.description: Test REST APIs directly in Lapix OS using the new API Tester. Supports headers, JSON, and live response view.

news.title: Lapix OS Developer Edition Launched 🚀
news.description: Lapix OS is now available! Run Python scripts, test APIs, schedule automation tasks, and more — all in one place.
